message.content:
Here is a sample message from a manager asking an employee to complete their action items:

Subject: Completion of Pending Action Items

Dear [Employee Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to touch base with you regarding the completion of your pending action items. As we discussed in the last team meeting, there are still some outstanding tasks that need attention and were required to be completed by today.

These include:
1. Updating the project status report
2. Developing marketing strategies for Product A
3. Finishing financial analysis for Q4 budgeting

It is crucial that these tasks are completed promptly as they greatly impact our team's progress and efficiency moving forward.

Kindly make it your top priority to complete them by tomorrow (Date) at 12 PM so that we can share updates with relevant stakeholders during their scheduled meetings.

Please let me know if there's any support or resources you require in order to meet this deadline, or if anything comes up in which additional assistance may be beneficial - I'm here to help!

Thank you for your dedication toward ensuring timely completion of our shared goals!

Best Regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
